name: Bakugou Katsuki (My Hero Academia)
description:
Lora model of Bakugou Katsuki from My Hero Academia. Preview pics were made with weight 0.8.

Not much to say, he's pretty cool :D Apart from outfits I tried tagging some expression: annoyed, angry, crazy smile, grin. So these works pretty well, and more importantly you can put them all in negative prompt if just want someone mentally stable instead. Just like in story, he will often end up angry without telling him to.

Outfits:

  • Student uniform - bakugou katsuki, school uniform, belt, white shirt, grey jacket, green pants, loafers

  • Short sleeved hero costume - bakugou katsuki, two-tone gloves, green belt, black tank top, bare shoulders, superhero, knee pads, black pants, boots

  • Long sleeve hero costume with collar - bakugou katsuki, two-tone gloves, green belt, high collar, bodysuit, superhero, knee pads, black pants, boots

  • Fantasy barbarian - bakugou katsuki, necklace, red cape, topless male, detached sleeves, belt, muscular, fur trim, black pants, knee pads, fur-trimmed boots (boots kinda don't work but you can give it a shot)

Optional outfit parts:

  • eye mask

  • grenade - these are his grenade gloves. That's probably the weakest part of model. They come out ok with some tries, but hands often end up mangled because of them. You might have to put higher weight on this.
